Class TetrisGUIGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisGUIGame

  • public class TetrisGUIGame
extends java.lang.Object
    TetrisGame stores current state of the game. It's updated by controller

      • attemptMove

        public void attemptMove(int moveType)
        Try to move the current piece with RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN, CW, CCW
        Parameters:
        moveType - for 5 kinds of move, right, left, down, rotate CW, rotate CCW

      • endRound

        public void endRound()
        Performed when a piece cannot move down anymore Ends the round by checking if the game should be over

      • checkForGameEnd

        public boolean checkForGameEnd()
